message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product to me is quite high, and $9,000 is below what I'm willing to accept. Could you consider $11,000? I'm confident this would be a fair deal.

I understand your perspective on the value of the product, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
